name: Eydori
description:
Merit in Art
The Eydori are a culture that values beauty, art, and craftsmanship above all else. They celebrate even minor occasions with festivals and believe that true worth comes from creating beautiful objects and architecture.

options.name: Artistic Inspiration
options.description: Spend a minute admiring an artifact, art piece or architecture (100+ years old, 100+ gold value). Gain a 1d4 Bonus to Performance Checks for the day and a 1d4 Bonus to your next Craft Check.

options.name: Festival Culture
options.description: Gain +1 Persuasion and you can organize impromptu celebrations that improve local morale.

options.name: Merit of Craft
options.description: Gain +1 Fabrication and items you craft are considered one quality level higher for sale value.
